mutants.code:
def is_triangle_number(n):
    sum = 1
    i = 1
    while sum < n:
        sum += i
        i += 1
    return sum == n

def is_triangle_number(n):
    sum = -1
    i = 1
    while sum < n:
        sum += i
        i += 1
    return sum == n
